column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Buy a Robot Online
#Text=Robots are a great pass-time .
#Text=Most people do n't play with robots , so you will need to buy one .
#Text=There are many sites that offer robots , and you will need to know how to buy one .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Shop
#Text=By Store
#Text=Log on .
#Text=Log on to your computer .
#Text=Open a new browser tab and take care of anything that needs to be taken care of .
#Text=Finally , get to a clean search engine page .
#Text=Deciding where you will buy the robot .
#Text=Many places offer robots for sale .
#Text=You will have to decide where you want to buy your robot .
#Text=Do you want to buy it by auction ( eBay ) or standard money ( Amazon ) ?
#Text=Do you want it new or used ?
#Text=There are many steps to make the final decision .
#Text=Searching for your robot .
#Text=Once you have made up basic preferences , search them .
#Text=Be sure to be as specific as possible .
#Text=If no results show up , check your spelling , then reword your search .
#Text=Click on results to read basic details .
#Text=Find a robot that is in your price range and works for you .
#Text=Purchase your robot .
#Text=Most sites require you to make an account then add money and your information to the account .
#Text=Most sites also require that you are 18+ years old .
#Text=Once you have made an account and verified you are eligible to purchase the robot , buy it .
#Text=Eventually , your robot will arrive in the mail .
#Text=Shop
#Text=By Robot
#Text=Log on .
#Text=Log on to your computer .
#Text=Open a new browser tab and take care of anything that needs to be taken care of .
#Text=Finally , get to a clean search engine page .
#Text=Deciding on the robot .
#Text=There are many different types of robots .
#Text=Each has their own special qualities , so see which best match you .
#Text=Read robot catalogs of many sites to make your final decision .
#Text=Be sure to read reviews on the robot .
#Text=After researching , find the model you want .
#Text=Many stores will probably sell the same model .
#Text=Chose the store you want and purchase ... .
#Text=Purchase your robot .
#Text=Most sites require you to make an account then add money and your information to the account .
#Text=Most sites also require that you are 18+ years old .
#Text=Once you have made an account and verified you are eligible to purchase the robot , buy it .
#Text=Eventually , your robot will arrive in the mail .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Check different sites to see which have the cheapest price .
#Text=Also , make sure the sites you use to purchase the robots are reliable .
#Text=Unreliable shops can steal your information .
#Text=Read reviews to see how well the robot performs and where and how it can best run .
#Text=Reviews often have useful tips in them .
#Text=Do n't solely base your purchase on reviews though .
#Text=Try to find sites that have a guarantee or warranty under their products .
#Text=If the robot malfunctions , you can always return the robot for a refund or a functional robot .
#Text=If a site seems to ask for too much information(social security numbers , etc. ) that wo n't be needed to make the purchase , do n't enter it .
#Text=The site might steal this information .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Unreliable sites may steal the information you enter onto their site .
#Text=Check their site credits and/or computer safety software before you begin entering key information .
